sentences.en: A judge agreed to extradite him to Texas.
sentences.cn: 一位法官同意将他引渡到德克萨斯州。

sentences.en: Rio or Uruguay or wherever it is that they do not extradite for murder ( Scott Turow )
sentences.cn: 里奥或乌鲁加伊或其它任何不会因杀人而引渡他们的地方 ( 斯科特图罗 )

sentences.en: The authorities refused to extradite him.
The court refused to extradite political refugees.
sentences.cn: 法庭拒绝引渡政治避难者.

sentences.en: The police arranged to extradite the jewel thief from the island state.
sentences.cn: 警方设法把珠宝盗窃犯从那个岛国引渡回国.

sentences.en: The police extradite the murderer from the island state.
sentences.cn: 警方设法把杀人犯从那个岛国引渡回国.

trans.tran_en: to use a legal process to send someone who may be guilty of a crime back to the country where the crime happened in order to judge them in a court of law

trans.tran_cn: 引渡（外国的罪犯），获取…的引渡，送还（逃犯）
